titleInfo.title: Rick Riman tapes - tape 5 of 5 - Side one channel two

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: As listed on insert: Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys radio and TV dubs. WTVK 1964-01-14 / 1964-01-28 / WEAR 1964-01-29 with Jim McReynolds (guitar); Jesse McReynolds (mandolin); Allen Shelton (banjo); Jim Brock (fiddle); Monroe Fields (bass); / Jim and Jesse at Echo Lake park, Afton, New York, 1965 (?); Same personal as previous except Ray Kirkland (bass); / Jesse McReynolds and Jim Brock (fiddles) believed to have been recorded at the University of Chicago Folk music festival in January of 1966 / Frank Wakefield and Red Allen on WDON-AM in Wheaton, Maryland in 1964 (?) with listed personnel as Frank Wakefield (mandolin); Red Allen (guitar); Pete Roberts (banjo); Tom Morgan (bass); Kenny Haddock (dobro). Audio restricted. Contact for access.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
